OOC: He's right. Zardus might have been a big part of the picture, but 
he was not the whole landscape. We all make this game alive!!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: We are not ending the RPG.  We will continue to play and 
thrive, even 
> with Zardus out of the picture.  I think we can and should keep it 
going.  
> Zardus wouldn't like it that we give up just because he isn't here.
